programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.sub-title: The Third Wheel Gets the Grace.
programme.desc: Will returns from holiday in France and spends every moment with Grace, provoking Nathan's jealousy, and a proud Jack takes his son shopping. Woody Harrelson guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Will's old adversary is hired to work at the law firm, filling him with the dread of renewed hostilities. Grace searches for the perfect gift for Nathan's birthday but is outdone by Karen, leading to a game of one-upmanship destined to end in tears. Comedy, guest starring Woody Harrelson and Adam Goldberg.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray discovers the leader of local group the Frontier Girls is intending to sell a record number of cookies in his area, and sets out to beat her at her own game. Comedy, starring Ray Romano and Amy Aquino.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert is offered a job with the FBI, but Marie's meddling ruins his chances and he refuses to forgive her for interfering. Brad Garrett and Doris Roberts star.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: When a Man Loves Two Women.
programme.desc: Cassandra Stone, the woman Frasier dated on Valentine's Day, agrees to go out with him again - but the appearance of his former girlfriend Faye, who has been out of the country for a while, complicates matters. Comedy, guest starring Virginia Madsen (Sideways) and Amy Brenneman (Private Practice).(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to marry Donny, but has a vision that suggests he is wrong for her, and tempts fate by turning to Niles for advice on how to proceed.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Shut Out in Seattle - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Daphne's engagement to Donny leaves Niles feeling down, so he seeks solace in the arms of a younger woman. Frasier keeps getting his girlfriend's name wrong, Martin's relationship with Bonnie turns sour, and Roz cannot bring herself to break up with Bulldog.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three of the most difficult cases he has taken on since the series began. First, he returns to Cafe Hon in Baltimore, Maryland, where owner Denise Whiting was trapped in a nasty battle with the community and had threatened the locals with lawsuits. Next, the chef goes back to Chiarella's in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. When he first visited owners Tommy and Dina DeFino, the business was struggling so badly that Tommy had completely lost his confidence and wife Dina had lost her patience. On his final stop, Gordon travels to Leone's in Montclair, New Jersey, where Rose Leone was depending on her lazy son Michael to run the restaurant.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Ian Snowley and Kay Marriot fell in love with the volcanic landscapes and coasts of Lanzarote, and are now determined to buy a house that they can use to explore the island further. Scarlette Douglas shows the couple five properties, hoping to maximise their budget of £150,000.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Kent compete to win the £1,000 prize, including married West End performers Millie and Andy, who channel family roots to prepare a Greek Cypriot-inspired menu. Newlyweds Sam and Emma hope to wow their guests with a glamorous beef Wellington they have spray-painted gold, while dinner party enthusiasts Alex and Richard aim to impress by remaining calm, collected and on-the-ball as they host the final gathering.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At Nikolas Patrick Pawnbrokers in Kent, brothers Charlie and Patrick inspect a collection of boxing memorabilia owned by former boxing promoter Kellie Maloney, as well as an unusual electric unicycle. At London Road in Sheffield, Dan has a diamond encrusted bracelet in his sights, and is also considering deals on two high-end leather belts and a huge collection of coins featuring some of the world's most dangerous creatures.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: American musician Jimmy Osmond joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, as Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley host the popular words-and-numbers game.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: Experts Kerr Drummond and Sara Damergi help Chipping Norton duo Leanne and Ricky look for a property in Scotland, with a budget of £220,000 to spend.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at The George and Abbotsford in Melrose, Scotland, where Andria Gardner and John Marr aim to pull out all the stops to impress their guests.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gym worker Toria hosts the third party in Liverpool, and hopes a kissing game around the dinner table, along with her flaky flapjacks, will be enough to secure the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart sets out to save Homer from the embarrassing effects of his latest misfortune, and does so well he becomes convinced he possesses miraculous healing powers. Featuring the guest voice of Don Cheadle (Iron Man 2).(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Maxine panics about a recent accusation even though Adam reassures Maxine that no one is going to believe that she has hit Toby. Elsewhere, Harry makes a dangerous decision, and Scott hassles Nancy for help with the summer fete but pushes her too far.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Ackley Bridge
programme.desc: New series. A six-part school drama series set in a Yorkshire mill town with a largely divided white and Asian population, as two formerly isolated comprehensive schools are merged into a brand new academy. In the first episode, English teacher Emma gets a shock when she finds out she's now working with her ex-boyfriend, while best friends and neighbours Missy and Nas attend school together for the first time.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 79-year-old woman is airlifted to hospital after being involved in a road traffic collision, with consultants concerned that she may have life-threatening internal bleeding. Meanwhile, 80-year-old Mohammad has come to A&E after falling at home during a family Eid celebratory feast, and 56-year-old Russ is brought in after falling from a ladder while cutting back some trees at work.(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: A worried Emmit asks his lawyer to investigate Varga, but an internet search leads to trouble for the attorney. Ray visits his brother in a seeming attempt to make peace with him, but is just creating a diversion while Nikki tries to steal the stamp. Gloria learns that Ennis wrote pulp sci-fi novels under the pseudonym Thaddeus Mobley, and also discovers that Maurice took a page from a phonebook with Ennis's information from the gas station that he stopped in on the night of the murder. Ewan McGregor and Carrie Coon star.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: Return of the documentary that follows the work of Bedfordshire Police around the clock as they investigate a number of major crimes. In the first edition, a man emerges from a hotel lift covered in blood and holding a fire extinguisher, before approaching the reception desk and shouting that he has killed someone. Cameras follow every twist and turn as detectives try to work out what really happened at the hotel close to Luton Airport, which has suddenly become a chaotic and bloody crime scene.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Two more singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who will be revealed to them one body part at a time. Single mum Tracy from Bedfordshire has been out of the dating game since she split with her fiancee three years ago and hopes to find a man who matches her adventurous side, while London sales advisor Matthew, 24, is tired of dating apps and thinks online profiles mean girls never actually see the real him. Anna Richardson hosts.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits four restaurants he earlier tried to save, finding out whether they stayed on the road to recovery or fallen by the wayside. First he visits the Spanish Pavillion in New Jersey, then heads to California to see the owners of Kingston Cafe, French-themed La Frite, and Capri.(n)

programme.title: Take Me Home Tonight
programme.desc: A talented college graduate drops out to work in a video store, to the consternation of his soon-to-be-married sister. When the girl he had a crush on in high school returns to town, he pretends to be a successful executive to impress her. An end-of-summer party leaves all three of them faced with the prospect of growing up. Comedy drama set in the 1980s, with Topher Grace, Anna Faris and Teresa Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer visits the town of Bradford-on-Avon in Wiltshire, where Ghika and Ronnie Coyle have been searching for the perfect property for 10 years. Also in the South West, Kirstie Allsopp helps cautious first-time buyers Mark and Ellie Devine look for a home in Bristol.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food Bites
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gives some of the nation's favourite dishes a twist, creating the ultimate toasted cheese sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: Bev and Graham hand-deliver a fire pit in the middle of a massive paintball battle, while Stu and Jemma continue to Spain with their load of classic rally cars.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: American musician Jimmy Osmond joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, as Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley host the popular words-and-numbers game.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Will tires of Karen's constant false alarms and vows to ignore her. Unfortunately, the moment he turns his back, the FBI turns up asking awkward questions about her husband. Meanwhile, Jack persuades Grace to accompany Elliot to a high-school dance. Comedy, starring Eric McCormack and Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Will proves to be a talented actor, while Grace accepts an invitation to move into Karen's penthouse - but soon outstays her welcome. American sitcom, starring Eric McCormack and Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra amuse the guests at a party by doing a wickedly accurate impression of Frank and Marie - who are not amused and respond in kind with an impersonation of their own.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra finds a cassette that contains a message from Ray's college girlfriend, and wants to know why he has saved it for all these years. She also shows Ray some of her keepsakes from previous relationships, prompting a severe case of jealousy on his part.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Shut Out in Seattle - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Niles and Roz take extreme action to solve dilemmas in their respective love lives. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, David Hyde Pierce and Peri Gilpin.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin and Niles meet the new woman in Frasier's life - and discover to their surprise that she looks just like his mother. Comedy, guest starring Rita Wilson (Sleepless in Seattle), alongside Kelsey Grammer, John Mahoney and David Hyde Pierce.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin and Frasier inadvertently offer to pay for Daphne's wedding, while Niles sinks into gloom as the marriage approaches and tries to console himself by dating someone new - unaware she is a prostitute. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to the Olde Hitching Post in Hanson, Massachusetts, where he meets a stubborn owner who doesn't react well to criticism. Tom bought the restaurant for his daughter Andrea, but six years later he's still refusing to let her run it. Can the chef break Tom's iron grip on the business and persuade him to change his outdated approach?.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Ever since Terry Windle and Julia Lenart got together 15 years ago, they have dreamed of having their own place in sunnier climes - and have decided Gran Canaria is the perfect place for them. Scarlette Douglas shows them five properties for their £100,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three sets of dinner-party hosts from Maidstone, Kent, compete, beginning with drama school owners Lisa and Iain, who cook an entirely Scottish menu. On the second night, Hannah and Paul fail to wow their guests with a Middle Eastern and Moroccan menu, while the final soiree sees Ling and Mark prepare food they like to call `Chinglish', which combines Ling's Chinese heritage and Mark's English roots.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Deals on the table today include a cross between a motorbike and a boat, rare vintage champagne, an unusual mechanical calculator, and an Aboriginal weapon known as a nulla nulla.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley host the popular words-and-numbers game, with American singer Jimmy Osmond joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Coast vs Country
programme.desc: David Bull and Kirsty Duffy help retired couple Tim and Sue find their forever home together in Somerset, searching both coastal and countryside properties on a budget of £390,000.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guests spend the night at Massimo Perrulli's hotel in County Durham, where one couple have cleanliness concerns, another are missing a bath and the third have an axe to grind.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Undergraduate Inzy is the fourth host in Liverpool, and he is on a mission to prove students really can cook. But his flirting with Toria may distract him from the kitchen.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns asks the family to look after his mansion while he books himself into a clinic for a complete check-up - but with Homer in charge, things are hardly likely to run smoothly. Featuring the guest voice of Britney Spears.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darcy's plan is beginning to work when Maxine tells Adam that she has decided to leave him, and Darren gets caught red-handed. Meanwhile, Ryan is worried about covering his tracks and Scott finds out some gossip about Mercedes mystery man.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A Labrador is rushed to Fitzpatrick's unable to stand, and although Professor Noel Fitzpatrick tells the family that surgery is not an option, his team devises an alternative care plan. The vets also treat a bichon frise suffering chronic elbow pain, and a leonberger has a bone tumour removed from its leg after being diagnosed with cancer.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4's Alternative Election Night
programme.desc: Jeremy Paxman, David Mitchell and Richard Osman launch an all-night feast of comedy and commentary in this more light-hearted take on polling day and the General Election, with contributions from a host of special guests in the studio and around the nation. The night includes special editions of Gogglebox and 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown, while Channel 4 News presenters Gary Gibbon and Cathy Newman will keep viewers up to date with all the results and breaking stories.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.sub-title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown: Election Special.
programme.desc: With the last hour of polling under way, Channel 4 takes a break from its results coverage so Jimmy Carr can present a special edition of the comedy words-and-numbers quiz. Jon Richardson and Alan Carr are the team captains, joined by Romesh Ranganathan, Sarah Millican and John Kearns, as well as regulars Rachel Riley and Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4's Alternative Election Night
programme.desc: As the polls close, Jeremy Paxman, Richard Osman and David Mitchell give their thoughts on the exit poll results, with reaction from a few political guests, and Channel 4 News presenters Gary Gibbon and Cathy Newman highlight the moments to stay up for. Plus, the cast of Gogglebox cast their eyes over the election campaign.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4's Alternative Election Night
programme.sub-title: Paxman, Mitchell and Osman: More Alternative Election.
programme.desc: Jeremy Paxman questions leading politicians as early results start coming in, and David Mitchell and Richard Osman present their own analysis, including a look at social media, voting trends and even where the smart money is going at the bookies. There are further laughs with the Gogglebox families, and more sensible input from Gary Gibbon and Cathy Newman.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Gull and Lily become stranded at sea, and Lily takes charge of the boat as Salty tries to guide them safely back to shore.(n)

programme.sub-title: A Simple Sunshine Can Make You Happy.
programme.desc: The rabbit looks for her friends so that she can play, but they are all busy doing other things.(n)

programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the gang on a trip to the mountains.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Garby the goat is stuck on a cliff edge, but when Ryder tries to rescue him he gets stranded too.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.desc: Thomas is excited at being asked to deliver new beehives to Farmer Trotter.(n)

programme.desc: Somebody is causing all the accidents in Toyland, and Noddy tries to find out who before something gets broken for good.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A flying saucer crashes on Farmer Yumi's land, and the pups help the pilot to return to his own planet.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The fairy loses her magic wand, so Ben uses his elf skills to find it.(n)

programme.desc: When Chips catches a shell in his fishing net, he's certain he's actually found a Sea Nut. He's determined to keep it - until the shell starts travelling around by itself.(n)

programme.sub-title: Now You See Me, Now You Don't.
programme.desc: The little rabbit, Alien, her brothers and sisters, and the squirrels and ducks all play a big game of hide-and-seek.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and his guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits The Black Bear Hotel, a coaching inn in Wareham, Dorset, run by first-time hotelier Lynda Maytum and her family. Three years in, the business is losing money and reviews are shockingly bad, so the hotel is rigged with cameras to give the Hotel Inspector the chance to see the management at work. However, when Alex fills the hotel with some surprise guests and their stay turns to chaos, she is forced to close the establishment down and demonstrate how an inn should be run.(n)

programme.title: Access

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie plays a final desperate card by arranging for someone to try to persuade Sonya to rebuild their broken family. Steph discovers Leo's intention for Sonya's nursery.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine is murdered, but it is not long before the prime suspect is also found dead. Tim and Abby discover a clue to both killings in an e-mail that suggests the victims were involved in a game with deadly consequences. Drama, starring Sean Murray and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: A Deadly Affair
programme.desc: Suspecting her husband Charlie of having an affair, author Mary trails him to the house he has been renovating, only to find his dead body. As she is having her own fling, Mary becomes the lead suspect in her spouse's murder. Thriller, starring Valerie Azlynn, Austin Highsmith and Luke Edwards. Edited for daytime violence.(n)

Armed officers descend in numbers following reports of a gun on the motorway, and a have-a-go hero helps to tackle a runaway drug driver.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A patient visits the surgery for treatment for a cyst in his ear, but doctors soon discover that he is also struggling with his mental health and offer their support. Meanwhile, a young boy and his worried mother are rushed to A&E after doctors fear a seemingly simple case of tummy ache could actually be a sign of appendicitis.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In Staffordshire agents try to collect nearly £2,500 in unpaid parking fines, while officers Matt and Gary head to the West Midlands to recover £4,500 owed from a debtor to his former girlfriend. Elsewhere, agents travel to south east London looking to collect £3,000 owed by a taxi company.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Highlights of the new housemates' first full day at the mercy of Big Brother, and if previous years are anything to go by, they will no doubt all be out to make a good impression on each other and the voting public.(n)

programme.title: Benefits Britain: Life on the Dole
programme.desc: People who have had their benefits cut or withheld since tougher sanctions began in October 2012, including Terry, whose payments were stopped after his partner clocked up more than 24 hours in one week in her job as a care worker. Other people featured include an aspiring rapper left with £3 a day to live on, a single mother-of-three who blames her jobless state on being overweight, and a former stripper who decides to move to Spain when he is threatened with being reassessed.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: Bea discovers that Simmo's daughter Carly is travelling to Thailand at the Holts' expense and persuades Linda to lie about seeing the girl with Brayden in the car park. Meanwhile, Franky tries to recruit Maxine to be her bodyguard, promising to help with her case after she is let down by her lawyer, but the new arrival remains adamant that she is not joining anyone's crew. Australian drama, starring Danielle Cormack and Nicole da Silva.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: A collection of internet-sourced videos with a family friendly hook, featuring some dating dos and don'ts and a selection of kitchen nightmares. Plus, hilarious horseplay, fishing for kittens and the Stars of the Week.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice visits Headcorn to help a couple spruce up their tiny cottage in a bid to make it more attractive to prospective buyers, clearing out all their clutter, getting rid of a dingy carpet and using small furniture to create an illusion of space.(n)

programme.title: Divine Designs
programme.desc: Cambridge academic Paul Binski continues his fact-finding journey through the history of religious art, visiting St Giles in Cheadle, Staffordshire, and the Free Church in Glasgow to see how Augustus Pugin and Alexander `Greek' Thomson, two notable Victorian architects, rejected the prevailing industrialism of their era and drew inspiration from the grandeur of the past.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS

programme.desc: Salty plans to ask Hatsie to come with him to a dance on Driftwood Bay, but a terrible mix-up leaves him thinking she already has a partner.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: James gets his leg stuck in a mysterious crate that he and Mandy find on the beach.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Hiro decides to help the Fat Controller by making decisions for him.(n)

programme.desc: Zeta puts a spell on Shimmer's mirror in order to steal her magic gems. However, in addition to the jewellery she accidentally transports Tala into her lair.(n)

programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings's wand goes missing, and Noddy suspects that someone is using it to perform magic because all over Toyland people have started to float in the air.(n)

programme.desc: Marshall's new pet Smiley is practising for a jumping competition, but the naughty frog hops into Skye's helicopter and activates the controls.(n)

programme.desc: Holly visits the elf farm to collect an egg for the king's breakfast, but an enormous chicken escapes and runs amok.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Fizzy is convinced she has turned Grumpy into a giant.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George and Peppa have fun playing in Grandpa Pig's garden, observing the worms, frogs and butterflies.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi visits the Gyreum, an eco-lodge in Co Sligo, which is run by Colum Stapleton and his daughter Finn. Alex brings in a busload of eco-tourists to give their verdicts and discovers damp mattresses, cold showers and some questionable service, but sparks fly when she insists the owner needs to roll up his sleeves and fix the shortcomings.(n)

programme.desc: Zac begs Leah to give him another chance, Hunter realises he is being too hard on VJ, while John is involved in a fight in jail, but his spirits lift when Marilyn visits with news.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya faces her demons and reconciles her past, Gary makes a huge mistake, while Steph is unable to believe how things have transpired between her, Paul and Leo.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team tries to find the culprit behind an ambush on a vehicle transporting marines in the desert, which resulted in the death of one man and abduction of two others. Kensi and Deeks bond as they track the SUV that took the missing soldiers, and Sam risks using a compromised cover identity to meet a former contact in a bid to discover if drug cartels were involved. Meanwhile, Nate returns from his mystery assignment.(n)

programme.title: Reluctant Witness
programme.desc: Erin believes that she has left her Mob ties behind after being placed in a witness protection programme. However, the man she thought she had killed turns up under an assumed identity and bent on revenge, meaning she must protect her new life and her family. Thriller, starring Mia Kirshner and Paul McGillion. Edited for violence.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya faces her demons and reconciles her past, Gary makes a huge mistake, while Steph is unable to believe how things have transpired between her, Paul and Leo.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Zac begs Leah to give him another chance, Hunter realises he is being too hard on VJ, while John is involved in a fight in jail, but his spirits lift when Marilyn visits with news.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the turbulent history of the Tower of London, which is one of Britain's most famous buildings and has been a military fortress, a palace, a royal mint, a prison, a zoo and a place of execution. He reveals how one king's obsession with money led to the Tower becoming the focus of the worst Jewish massacre the country had ever seen and explains how a mob of disgruntled peasants managed to break through its defences as they sought bloody revenge for taxes they could no longer put up with.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The documentary follows 34-year-old Shaun from Stockton-on-Tees who has been on and off benefits - and in and out of trouble with the police - since leaving school, and is finally trying to turn his life around. Leon from Ashton-under-Lyme is fed up of only finding jobs with zero-hours contracts but cannot afford the transport to look further afield, while Knowsley-based cab driver Mark has not worked since having his licence revoked following an angina attack two years ago. Now he struggles to manage the stairs to his flat and needs moving to a new home.(n)

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Kent couple Rachel and Chris are pushed to the limit when their relationship with their tenant breaks down and she stops paying rent, leaving them more than £5,000 out of pocket. Now they need to get her out or they could lose the house. Elsewhere, a tenant uses scare tactics to keep his landlord off his back, and in Harrow, council housing officers investigate a residential property that has been turned into a brothel.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the BB companion show, including celebrity fans' thoughts on the latest developments in the run-up to tomorrow's eviction and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Eerie saga about a rare-book buyer who becomes a target of unknown forces when he's asked to find a volume about the Devil(n)

programme.title: Ramona
programme.desc: An elderly woman who announces she is ready to die has second thoughts after her family members begin to make preparations(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: NaÏve Texan Joe Buck drifts to New York and, with the help of local wheeler-dealer Enrico 'Ratso' Rizzo, tries to make a living as a gigolo(n)

programme.title: Chasing Papi
programme.desc: A brisk pace and a strong cast fuel this spirited romantic farce. An executive (Eduardo Verastegui) from L.A. romances three women at the same time---a vibrant Miami waitress, a Manhattan debutante and a brainy Chicago lawyer. But the womanizer's happy world shatters when all three women visit him and discover his infidelity. Roselyn Sanchez, Sofia Vergara, Jaci Velasquez(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: A TV reporter sets out to change her ways after a homeless psychic tells her that she has only a week to live(n)

programme.title: Fierce People
programme.desc: Finn dreams of leaving the small apartment he shares with his mother in New York and going to join his father, an anthropologist he's never met, in South America to study Iskanani Indians. However, his dreams are shattered as his mother, trying to kick a drug addiction and get their lives back on track, takes him to live in a country estate to an old aquaintence. There he encounters a totally different tribe: the super rich(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two daffy adult sisters throw one last raging party in their childhood home before it's sold by their parents, with disastrous results(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: Harry Callahan or Dirty Harry is investigating a strange betting game. A list of local celebrities has been handed out, and bets are being taken on who will be the first to die(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: The Transporter star Jason Statham takes the wheel in director Paul W.S. Anderson's remake of the Roger Corman classic about a hyper-violent cross-country race that breaks all of the traditional rules of the road. The time is the not-so-distant future, and as America's prisons begin overflowing with violent criminals, the powers that be devise a grisly game that will free up space in the cells and entertain the masses at the same time. Jensen Ames (Statham) is a three-time speedway champion with a dark past. A survival expert and ex-con whose sordid history comes back to haunt him when he is framed for a murder he didn't commit, Ames is forced to choose between donning the metallic mask of a mythical racer known as Frankenstein or languishing away on Terminal Island -- America's most notorious penitentiary. Over the course of the next three days, this unlikely champion will get behind the wheel of a nightmare machine outfitted with machine guns, grenade launchers, and flamethrowers in a desperate attempt to outrun some of the most violent criminals ever imprisoned. Should Ames be the first to cross the checkered flag, he will win his freedom; should he come in second, however, death would be preferable to a grim future in a cramped concrete cell. Co-stars include Joan Allen, Ian McShane, Natalie Martinez, and Tyrese Gibson, who takes over the role of Machine Gun Joe, made famous by Sylvester Stallone in the original(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex . Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A Texas congressman uses his influence to supply Afghan fighters with money and arms in their battle against Soviet occupiers in the 1980s. Based on a true story(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Before Jayson Blair made headlines for his plagiarized New York Times reporting, Stephen Glass defamed the weekly current events magazine The New Republic with a series of eye-catching, entertaining, and completely fabricated stories. Now Glass' trail of lies gets the big-screen treatment in writer/director Billy Ray's Shattered Glass, featuring Hayden Christensen in the title role. The film chronicles Glass' time at the magazine in the late '90s, when his colorful coverage of a hedonistic Young Republican convention, superstar web hackers, and the circus surrounding the Bill Clinton/Monica Lewinsky scandal made him the toast of the publishing world, garnering attention from such national publications as George and Rolling Stone. Barely out of college, the eager Glass ingratiates himself with the office staff, including his mentor, managing editor Michael Kelly (Hank Azaria). But when Kelly is unceremoniously fired and replaced with editor Chuck Lane (Peter Sarsgaard), Glass' pieces come under a greater degree of scrutiny, until one in particular threatens to expose his tall tales to the rest of the world. Based in part on a Vanity Fair article by journalist Buzz Bissinger, Shattered Glass premiered at the Telluride and Toronto film festivals before its limited fall theatrical release(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube and Spike Jonze star in this all-action adventure. A small group of adventurous American soldiers in Iraq at the end of the Gulf War are determined to steal a huge cache of gold reputed to be hidden somewhere near their desert base(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: This taut William Friedkin thriller features powerhouse performances by Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson. Jackson plays a Marine colonel on trial for a mission that went horribly wrong; Jones is his lawyer, a friend who doubts his innocence. Ben Kingsley,Guy Pearce, Bruce Greenwood(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: A ragtag group of juvenile delinquents assigned the task of cleaning up an abandoned hotel find out just how deadly community service can be when they are stalked by a monstrous, four-hundred-pound maniac with a grudge in director Gregory Dark's wrestling-infused survival horror flick. It was a mere four years ago that seven-foot menace Jacob Goodnight (WWE superstar Kane) was shot in the head and left for dead by a local police officer. But Jacob wasn't going down that easy. With a steel plate subsequently attached to his skull and ten razor-sharp fingernails ready to scrape grey matter from the skulls of his victims, Jacob retreated to the abandoned Blackwell Hotel, where he resided in the darkened, rotting hallways while planning his ultimate revenge. As fate would have it, Jacob wouldn't have to go far to satiate his raging bloodlust, though, and as the unsuspecting teens make their way through the crumbling corridors of the once-luxurious inn guided by the very same policeman who fired that misguided bullet years earlier, the notorious killer sharpens his nails, stalks his prey, and prepares for a little payback(n)

programme.title: La pantalla desnuda
programme.desc: The lives of a woman and her boyfriend are irrevocably altered when a sex tape of them is released online by an infatuated mutual friend(n)

programme.title: Sunshine State
programme.desc: Like Lone Star, Sunshine State is a John Sayles film in which a multitude of characters struggle with the past, both recent and ancient -- both family history and the traumatic past of the land itself. It's set on the fictional Plantation Island in Florida, the history of which is based upon Amelia Island, where the film was actually shot. Lincoln Beach, the once thriving black community on the island, is based on the region's American Beach. Sunshine State portrays a relentless onslaught of real estate developers in the area. Desiree Perry (Angela Bassett, who was also in Sayles' Passion Fish and City of Hope) has returned to Florida for the first time since being sent away as a pregnant teen. She nervously brings her husband, Reggie (James McDaniel of NYPD Blue), an anesthesiologist, to meet her estranged mother, Eunice (Mary Alice). Eunice has recently taken in a troubled teenaged relative, Terrell (newcomer Alexander Lewis). Eunice's friend, Dr. Lloyd (Bill Cobbs), is trying to rally the Lincoln Beach community to slow development. Marly Temple (Edie Falco of The Sopranos, here playing a Southerner) runs the motel owned by her ailing father (Ralph Waite of Waltons fame), but has little interest in the business, and the developers are pressuring her to get her father to sell. She's in the process of ending a relationship with the local golf pro (Marc Blucas from TV's Buffy the Vampire Slayer), when a rather mercenary landscape architect, Jack Meadows (Timothy Hutton), catches her eye. Meanwhile, Francine Pickney (Mary Steenburgen) is so busy organizing the town's cheesy Buccaneer Days festival that she doesn't realize that her husband, Earl (Gordan Clapp, also of NYPD Blue and a Sayles regular) is suicidal. As usual, Sayles wrote, directed, and edited the film, with Maggie Renzi producing(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: When he has a vision of his flight to Paris crashing, a teen travelling with his French club makes a scene and they are all kicked off the airline. The plane goes down and the survivors are grateful, but Death hunts them down(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: Chilling mystery starring Kevin Bacon, based on a novel by cult author Richard Matheson. After being hypnotised, a man starts experiencing disturbing visions of a ghostly girl(n)

programme.title: Bug
programme.desc: Agnes is running away from her ex boyfriend with her new boyfriend Peter. Peter is also on the run from the military - and bugs that he believes is going to take over his body. Together they seek shelter at a small motel. Soon Agnes also sees the bugs' crawling up from every corner witch is the start for a joint battle against the bugs. Slowly paranoia and fear takes over and threatens to destroy them both mentally and physically(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars as a cop with vengeance on his mind in John Moore's video game-based CGI noir. The eponymous NYPD detective's life is torn apart by the brutal murder of his wife and child. Determined to track down those responsible and wreak bloody revenge, he leaves no stone unturned. His dedication pays off when investigating a tip-off about some drugs dealers(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Blind lawyer Matt Murdock, whose smell, touch, taste and hearing have been heightened as a result of a chemical accident, uses his superpowers to fight crime as the costumed vigilante Daredevil. With the help of Elektra, Murdock takes on mob boss Kingpin and his hired assassin Bullseye(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: A cop in a hi-tech "pre-crime" unit in 2054 goes on the run after being labelled as a future killer. In order to prove his innocence, he kidnaps one of the psychics who predicts the imminent crimes while eluding a determined government agent(n)

programme.title: Dave Chappelle's Block Party
programme.desc: In September 2004, comedian Dave Chappelle took a break from his immensely successful Comedy Central show to stage a free, unpublicized, all-star hip-hop concert in the Clinton Hill neighborhood of Brooklyn, NY. Inviting fans over the Internet, on the street, and even in his family's hometown of Yellow Springs, OH, Chappelle asked filmmaker Michel Gondry to document the event from its inception on through to the performances themselves. The result is Dave Chappelle's Block Party, a concert film that provides not only a sampling of the music on display that September, but also an intimate look at the comedian himself. Gondry's cameras tag along with Chappelle as he visits Ohio, recruits a university marching band to play at the show, and surveys the opinions of Clinton Hill on the show that's about to take place. Along the way, we're introduced to some the comedian's favorite acts, in rehearsals and on-stage: Dead Prez, Jill Scott, Mos Def, the Roots, Erykah Badu, Kanye West, and the surprise reuniting of the Fugees(n)

Jensen Ames (Statham) is a three-time speedway champion with a dark past. A survival expert and ex-con whose sordid history comes back to haunt him when he is framed for a murder he didn't commit, Ames is forced to choose between donning the metallic mask of a mythical racer known as Frankenstein or languishing away on Terminal Island -- America's most notorious penitentiary. Over the course of the next three days, this unlikely champion will get behind the wheel of a nightmare machine outfitted with machine guns, grenade launchers, and flamethrowers in a desperate attempt to outrun some of the most violent criminals ever imprisoned. Should Ames be the first to cross the checkered flag, he will win his freedom; should he come in second, however, death would be preferable to a grim future in a cramped concrete cell. Co-stars include Joan Allen, Ian McShane, Natalie Martinez, and Tyrese Gibson, who takes over the role of Machine Gun Joe, made famous by Sylvester Stallone in the original(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex . Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A Texas congressman uses his influence to supply Afghan fighters with money and arms in their battle against Soviet occupiers in the 1980s. Based on a true story(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Before Jayson Blair made headlines for his plagiarized New York Times reporting, Stephen Glass defamed the weekly current events magazine The New Republic with a series of eye-catching, entertaining, and completely fabricated stories. Now Glass' trail of lies gets the big-screen treatment in writer/director Billy Ray's Shattered Glass, featuring Hayden Christensen in the title role. The film chronicles Glass' time at the magazine in the late '90s, when his colorful coverage of a hedonistic Young Republican convention, superstar web hackers, and the circus surrounding the Bill Clinton/Monica Lewinsky scandal made him the toast of the publishing world, garnering attention from such national publications as George and Rolling Stone. Barely out of college, the eager Glass ingratiates himself with the office staff, including his mentor, managing editor Michael Kelly (Hank Azaria). But when Kelly is unceremoniously fired and replaced with editor Chuck Lane (Peter Sarsgaard), Glass' pieces come under a greater degree of scrutiny, until one in particular threatens to expose his tall tales to the rest of the world. Based in part on a Vanity Fair article by journalist Buzz Bissinger, Shattered Glass premiered at the Telluride and Toronto film festivals before its limited fall theatrical release(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube and Spike Jonze star in this all-action adventure. A small group of adventurous American soldiers in Iraq at the end of the Gulf War are determined to steal a huge cache of gold reputed to be hidden somewhere near their desert base(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: This taut William Friedkin thriller features powerhouse performances by Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson. Jackson plays a Marine colonel on trial for a mission that went horribly wrong; Jones is his lawyer, a friend who doubts his innocence. Ben Kingsley,Guy Pearce, Bruce Greenwood(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge(n)

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: A ragtag group of juvenile delinquents assigned the task of cleaning up an abandoned hotel find out just how deadly community service can be when they are stalked by a monstrous, four-hundred-pound maniac with a grudge in director Gregory Dark's wrestling-infused survival horror flick. It was a mere four years ago that seven-foot menace Jacob Goodnight (WWE superstar Kane) was shot in the head and left for dead by a local police officer. But Jacob wasn't going down that easy. With a steel plate subsequently attached to his skull and ten razor-sharp fingernails ready to scrape grey matter from the skulls of his victims, Jacob retreated to the abandoned Blackwell Hotel, where he resided in the darkened, rotting hallways while planning his ultimate revenge. As fate would have it, Jacob wouldn't have to go far to satiate his raging bloodlust, though, and as the unsuspecting teens make their way through the crumbling corridors of the once-luxurious inn guided by the very same policeman who fired that misguided bullet years earlier, the notorious killer sharpens his nails, stalks his prey, and prepares for a little payback(n)

programme.title: La pantalla desnuda
programme.desc: The lives of a woman and her boyfriend are irrevocably altered when a sex tape of them is released online by an infatuated mutual friend(n)

programme.title: Sunshine State
programme.desc: Like Lone Star, Sunshine State is a John Sayles film in which a multitude of characters struggle with the past, both recent and ancient -- both family history and the traumatic past of the land itself. It's set on the fictional Plantation Island in Florida, the history of which is based upon Amelia Island, where the film was actually shot. Lincoln Beach, the once thriving black community on the island, is based on the region's American Beach. Sunshine State portrays a relentless onslaught of real estate developers in the area. Desiree Perry (Angela Bassett, who was also in Sayles' Passion Fish and City of Hope) has returned to Florida for the first time since being sent away as a pregnant teen. She nervously brings her husband, Reggie (James McDaniel of NYPD Blue), an anesthesiologist, to meet her estranged mother, Eunice (Mary Alice). Eunice has recently taken in a troubled teenaged relative, Terrell (newcomer Alexander Lewis). Eunice's friend, Dr. Lloyd (Bill Cobbs), is trying to rally the Lincoln Beach community to slow development. Marly Temple (Edie Falco of The Sopranos, here playing a Southerner) runs the motel owned by her ailing father (Ralph Waite of Waltons fame), but has little interest in the business, and the developers are pressuring her to get her father to sell. She's in the process of ending a relationship with the local golf pro (Marc Blucas from TV's Buffy the Vampire Slayer), when a rather mercenary landscape architect, Jack Meadows (Timothy Hutton), catches her eye. Meanwhile, Francine Pickney (Mary Steenburgen) is so busy organizing the town's cheesy Buccaneer Days festival that she doesn't realize that her husband, Earl (Gordan Clapp, also of NYPD Blue and a Sayles regular) is suicidal. As usual, Sayles wrote, directed, and edited the film, with Maggie Renzi producing(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Animals in Love
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin presents the first of two programmes exploring animal relationships, finding out how they meet, mate and form relationships, and asking whether they can fall in love the same as humans. On her travels, she finds several animals that have discovered the secrets of successful long-lasting relationship, including the bonobo of the Congo, Africa's wild dogs and tamarins in the UK. But there are other sides to the story, like the devoted penguin couple that stayed together for 10 years, only for things to turn out not quite as they seemed. Liz also hears how a Siamaon gibbon dealt with the death of his life partner and meets a pair of elephants with an extraordinary friendship.(n)

programme.title: Monster Bug Wars
programme.desc: A tent spider battles a katydid, a banded huntsman confronts a jungle huntsman and a rhinoceros beetle faces off against a meat ant.(n)

programme.title: Biggest & Baddest
programme.desc: Niall McCann joins gorilla doctors in Uganda's Bwindi Forest to tend to some unwell primates.(n)

programme.title: Wild Canada
programme.desc: A look at pronghorn antelopes, wolverines and beavers in boreal forests and prairies.(n)

programme.title: Yellowstone
programme.desc: Summer returns, transforming the landscape of the famous national park from a frozen wilderness into the ideal environment for newborn animals. programme.title: Wild Justice

programme.title: Animals in Love
programme.desc: In the second of two programmes about relationships in the wild, Liz Bonnin explores the ways in which animals get together. She observes a form of extreme flirting in a troop of capuchin monkeys in South America, which sees the females go to extraordinary lengths to attract the alpha male, reveals how African hyenas find it tough getting a girl and how an orang-utan in America chooses its partner in a very 21st-century way. For other animals, it turns out smell is a deal-breaker, while for others, it's all about having the best moves on the dance floor.(n)

programme.title: Monster Bug Wars
programme.desc: A giant rainforest mantis takes on a spiky leaf insect, and a Sydney funnel web spider attacks a garden wolf spider.(n)

programme.title: Biggest & Baddest
programme.desc: Niall McCann travels to a national park in Uganda to learn how some villagers are to blame for the decline in lion numbers.(n)

programme.title: Wild Canada
programme.desc: Polar bear cubs discover ice, a young caribou dances in the cold and eider ducks dive for mussels.(n)

programme.title: Yellowstone
programme.desc: An early dusting of snow signals the end of autumn, a time when the forests are a blaze of red and gold and the animals prepare for the coming cold. The elk face hungry wolves as they move down from the mountains to feed in the valleys, while beavers rush to defend their habitat against the destructive ice, repairing dams and stocking underwater larders before the waters freeze over.(n)

programme.title: The Wicker Tree
programme.desc: A pair of virginal Texas missionaries travel to Tressock, Scotland, and make a shocking discovery after agreeing to participate in a local festival in this chilling companion piece to the horror classic, "The Wicker Man."(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa is just another journeyman fighter, until champ Apollo Creed gives him a surprise shot at the title. Zero to hero boxing movie(n)

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: After their public access TV show is ruined by a slimy executive, hapless metalheads Wayne and Garth fight to get it back on air(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: (1989) After Aliens, James Cameron took to the ocean's depths for this sci-fi thriller. Ed Harris and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio star as Bud and Lindsey Brigman, a husband-and-wife team running the rescue rig that's trying to get to a nuclear submarine that's gone down on the lip of one of the world's deepest sea trenches. But when psychotic Navy SEAL commander Lt Hiram Coffey (Michael Biehn) launches a nuclear warhead into the trench, they discover they are not alone in the depths... M,R,S(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A giant shark is feeding on the people of Amity Island and it's up to police chief Martin Brody to hunt down the finned fiend. Thriller(n)

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: Joshua Jackson stars in this thriller as a poor undergraduate at an exclusive college who's tapped for a centuries-old secret society, and finds out the hard way that membership does indeed have its privileges. Leslie Bibb, Hill Harper, Paul Walker, Craig T. Nelson, William Petersen(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: Wild and woolly animated misadventure features the titular canine action star (voice of John Travolta) of a hit TV series, who actually believes he has superpowers. When he accidentally winds up in New York City, he must find his way back to Hollywood, so he recruits a streetwise alley cat and a hero-worshiping hamster for the road trip. Other voice talent includes Miley Cyrus, Susie Essman and Mark Walton. Directed by Byron Howard and Chris Williams, who cowrote the script with Dan Fogelman(n)

programme.desc: This Is Real. The future of the club is jeopardized as the rift between Ghost and Tasha intensifies. Later, Ghost fears that his pursuit of Angela could impact his legitimate life and place his family in danger(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Who Are You. Ghost and Tommy meet with gang leaders as Angela schedules surveillance to monitor the gathering; the mystery assailant returns; and Ghost confesses to Angela that he's married with children(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: Beyoncé stars as R&B star Etta James in this musical drama of sex, violence and rock 'n' roll set in 1950s Chicago(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: All-action adventure spiced with humour in which a retired Special Forces colonel returns to action when a ruthless south American dictator kidnaps his 11-year-old daughter. Armed to the teeth, he sets out to bring her back, leaving little else in one piece(n)

programme.title: To Rome With Love
programme.desc: Locals and tourists in Rome find their lives intersecting. An architect tries to recapture his youth; an ordinary guy unexpectedly becomes famous; a couple is torn apart by new love interests; and an opera director urges a mortician to sing on stage(n)

programme.title: Sorority Boys
programme.desc: If Mel Gibson had to get inside the mind of women to respect and understand them, in this teenage film the main characters will have to dress up as such to be able to do the same. Adam, Dave and Doofer are three college students who, after being thrown out of their brotherhood, find refuge in a neighboring sisterhood, made up of… feminists. To secure their space there they must dress up and keep a low profile. Until now, they had been cruel to girls, but this soon changes(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: Every year baseball groupie Annie chooses one player to teach, on and off the diamond. The lucky man usually has the best year of his career. But will it be veteran catcher Crash or young hotshot Nuke?(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A giant shark is feeding on the people of Amity Island and it's up to police chief Martin Brody to hunt down the finned fiend. Thriller(n)

programme.title: 5 Days of War
programme.desc: A war correspondent covers Russia's 2008 invasion of Georgia and attempts to help a teacher rescue her family during the chaos(n)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Six southern belles deal with marriages, deaths, births and everything in between by staying strong as steel on the inside, and immaculate on the outside, thanks to therapeutic visits to their local beauty salon(n)

programme.title: Me, Myself & Irene
programme.desc: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates(n)

programme.title: The Original Kings of Comedy
programme.desc: Riotous concert documentary from the 'Kings Of Comedy' stand-up tour(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Gotta Go. Tasha gets involved in club business after growing concerned about Ghost's attitude; and later, Ghost and Angela's affair heats up, while Tommy shows interest in a club employee(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Who You With?. While Tommy is making peace with Ruiz, Angela's attaching a wire to one of his gang members; and a distracted Ghost forgets Tasha's birthday. Later, Ghost and Angela contemplate the implications of their affair(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: All-action adventure spiced with humour in which a retired Special Forces colonel returns to action when a ruthless south American dictator kidnaps his 11-year-old daughter. Armed to the teeth, he sets out to bring her back, leaving little else in one piece(n)

programme.title: Kickboxer 2: The Road Back
programme.desc: This sequel to the popular Jean-Claude Van Damme vehicle centers on the exploits of David Sloan (Sasha Mitchell) the younger brother of the two fighters (Van Damme and Dennis Alexio) who died in the first installment. As this episode begins, David has given up competition and is running a kickboxing school for underprivileged urban kids. His life changes abruptly when the villainous fight manager who murdered his brother shows up and forces him back into the ring. Fortunately, David's Zen master shows up for spiritual and moral support. The ensuing fight scenes are quite bloody and violent(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: In this sci-fi/horror scarefest, Dr. William Weir is a scientist who has designed a spacecraft called Event Horizon which will explore the outer reaches of space past the planet Neptune; the ship employs a special transport mechanism that, in effect, creates a black hole that the ship can pass through, allowing it to travel tremendous distances in a few seconds. The Event Horizon mysteriously disappears in the midst of a mission with no trace of either the ship or its crew, but it reappears in Neptune's orbit after a seven year absence and it's sending out a distress signal(n)

programme.title: Bats
programme.desc: Horror flick about a scientist and a local sheriff trying to stop deadly and unexplained bat attacks in a small Texas town(n)

programme.title: Rapid Fire
programme.desc: Years after he watched his CIA agent dad killed in Tiananmen Square, Chicago arts student Jake is caught in a Mafia turf war. He witnesses a gangland killing and finds himself having to fight to stay alive(n)

programme.title: Renaissance
programme.desc: Christian Volckman's groundbreaking rotoscoped monochrome animation is set in dystopian Paris, 2054. The biggest company - bigger even than the city's government - is cosmetics company Avalon, run by Paul Dellenbach. When one of their valuable scientists is kidnapped, rogue cop Barthelemy Karas takes on the case and teams up with Bislane Tasuiev but each new lead takes them into deadlier peril..(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: The hilarious catalogue of the exploits of a bunch of young army recruits. Bill Murray stars as a wisecracking good-for-nothing who's been tempted by the army's latest advertising campaign and who has managed to get his best buddy Ramis to join him in signing up. The late John Candy gets an early role as the (predictably) large recruit who gets in on all the fun and games - some at his own expense(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets

programme.title: Freelancers
programme.desc: The son of a slain NYPD officer joins the police force and attempts to expose a conspiracy of rogue cops who are covering up the truth of his father's murder. Meanwhile, his shady boss tries to test his loyalty(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Circus.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer suspects a circus animal trainer is responsible for the murder of an unpopular ringmaster - but Adrian focuses his investigation on the victim's ex-wife, a trapeze artist who is also a sharpshooter. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A couple are murdered on their way to a high-school reunion, prompting Patrick to investigate the untrustworthy characters at the event. He connects the incident to a past case of bullying, and when he notices that Rigsby bears a resemblance to one of the victims, he tries to lure the killer out with an audacious scheme. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Tim Kang.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The corpse of a media-relations officer is unearthed at the opening of a new development in Salter, Central Valley. Mayor Melba Shannon blames eco-terrorists for the murder, but the officers later uncover evidence suggesting she herself could be to blame. When Patrick Jane is kidnapped he puts his life in danger by revealing he knows the true identity of the gang's leader. Elsewhere, a reporter films a documentary about Lisbon's unit at CBI HQ. Guest starring Sharon Lawrence (NYPD Blue).(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate and the team race to the top of a mountain, where they hope to recover lost evidence crucial to their mission to take down a corrupt financier. However, their expedition is threatened by a gang of hired guns and dangerous weather conditions. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: A mark is killed in the middle of one of the team's stings, leaving Nate in the frame for murder. With their colleague's freedom at stake, the con artists are forced to locate the real killer and complete their mission. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The body of a saleswoman is found in the boot of a car at a luxury showroom, and an autopsy reveals she was run over. As inquiries proceed, the agents begin to suspect her boyfriend is to blame, but Jane is unconvinced and tries to draw the real murderer out into the open - only to end up destroying a Lamborghini. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Cho is forced to revisit old haunts and confront his murky past as he investigates the fatal shooting of a reformed criminal who used to belong to the same gang as him. Helped by Jane, he visits the victim's workplace to question his employer - but uses such heavy-handed tactics that he finds himself facing the threat of a lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team members target a corrupt PR agent, plotting to use his own tactics to give him 15 minutes of fame. Once they have taken him public, the con artists plan to use his new-found celebrity to expose his hidden secrets. Crime drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team sets out to track down a lost Vincent van Gogh painting, and discovers the missing piece was at the heart of a Second World War romance between a black soldier and the white heiress he was forced to abandon. Guest starring Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Confidential files are leaked by an anonymous hacker, who threatens to release more unless the Navy agrees to renew a contract with a struggling shipbuilding firm. The Navy Secretary suspects the company's owner Philip Wickes is to blame, and asks NCIS to join forces with the PsyOps unit in an elaborate ruse to bring the culprit out of hiding. Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Vance's brother-in-law Michael Thomas is linked to the murder of a petty officer, and Gibbs is placed under pressure to clear the man's name. Meanwhile, a negative performance review leaves Tony feeling downhearted and he resolves to prove the assessment wrong by being less chatty while on duty. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Rocky Carroll.(n)

programme.title: Shots Fired
programme.desc: New series. Two black prosecutors investigate what seems to be string of racially motivated shootings in a southern US town. Crime drama, starring Sanaa Lathan and Stephan James.(n)

programme.title: Prison Break
programme.desc: Poseidon continues to work against Michael and the gang, leading to a climactic showdown, one that has fatal consequences. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter, Joe, Cleveland and Quagmire help throw Jesus an important birthday party after running into the Son of God at the Quahog Mall. Animation following the misadventures of America's disaster-prone Griffin family, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Stewie, Chris and Brian's Excellent Adventure.
programme.desc: Stewie and Brian use their time machine to help Chris pass his history test so he does not have to re-sit the whole year, but trouble ensues when the trio all get stuck in the past.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine fakes an affair to impress the glamorous Ladybugs, but finds they are not the kind of people she wants to be associated with. Stan, however, is happier with his new companion. American animated comedy, with the voices of Wendy Schaal and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger and Stan have a blazing argument and exchange lives when the ensuing fight causes a Freaky Friday situation, giving them an insight into each other's problems, responsibilities and relationships. Elsewhere, Steve plucks up the courage to ask a girl out.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: A behind the scenes look at some of the most outrageous moments from the animated comedy following the misadventures of America's disaster-prone Griffin family. Featuring interviews with the show's creator Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The residents of Quahog turn against one another as they become embroiled in a treasure hunt sparked by Peter's interpretation of the design on a restaurant placemat.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan thinks his chances of promotion are over when Hayley disrupts the CIA family carnival. However, when he pays Director Bullock a home visit to apologise, he discovers his badly behaved daughter is the boss's new girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan takes personal responsibility for Steve's sex education - but his advice is taken much too literally. Meanwhile, Roger gets a job as a barman in the hope of bettering himself. Animation, with the voices of Seth McFarlane and Scott Grimes.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian begins a new career as an estate agent after having cosmetic surgery, which gets him in trouble with Quagmire after encouraging his friend to buy a new property.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Peter go out on a mission to find a new Thanksgiving turkey after they drunkenly consume the whole bird the night before the holiday. Meanwhile, Chris decides to become the man of the house while his father is away.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan takes Hayley to National Gun Association Land after being forced to spend more time with her - but the trip only highlights their differing opinions on weapon control. Meanwhile, Steve becomes convinced he is adopted.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve's book makes him famous, leading Stan to become a horrendously pushy `stage parent'. Acquiring an agent, the teenager leaves his family for a life of luxury. Comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A talented chef is poisoned during a culinary competition at an exclusive restaurant. After quizzing the other contestants, Jane discovers one of them encouraged the victim, a recovering alcoholic, to relapse in a bid to sabotage his chances, and learns he was in debt to a loan shark. However, it later emerges that a jealous partner could be to blame. Crime drama, guest starring Dina Meyer.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A scientist contacts Jane for help after being exposed to a deadly virus, leaving her with only a short time to live. He rushes to the facility where she works and compiles a list of possible suspects, including her husband - but later discovers the security systems have been tampered with, letting anyone enter the lab. It then emerges that a flask containing the toxin has been emptied in the staff room, threatening the entire team. Crime drama, guest starring Tony Curran (This Life).(n)

programme.title: Leverage

programme.title: Leverage

programme.desc: A marine lieutenant's body falls from the sky and the team links the man's death to the disappearance of a Navy chaplain thought to have been kidnapped by rebels working with Colombian crime cartels. Crime drama, guest starring Karina Lombard (The L Word) and Jamie Lee Curtis (A Fish Called Wanda).(n)

programme.desc: A fire crew discovers a man's body after putting out a raging blaze at a warehouse belonging to a Navy-contracted electronics company, and Gibbs recognises the victim as Carter Plimpton - a former member of an NCIS black-ops unit. programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Selma's Choice. After the death of their somewhat beloved Aunt Gladys, Marge Simpson (voice of Julie Kavner) and her husband, Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta), and children, Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright), Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith), and Maggie, attend the funeral with Marge's sisters, Patty and Selma (both also voiced by Julie Kavner). In her videotaped will, Aunt Gladys urges Patty and Selma not to remain childless and die alone, advice Selma takes to heart. However, the less-than-glamorous Selma has a hard time attracting eligible men, and after a number of humiliating experiences with dating services, Selma considers resorting to artificial insemination. On the day of a family outing to the Duff Gardens theme park, Homer falls ill and Marge asks Selma to take the kids to Duff Garden, imagining spending the afternoon watching over the kids would be good training for a future mom such as Selma; however, Selma soon learns parenthood is more complex than she imagined. "Selma's Choice" was first aired on January 21, 1993(n)
